sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: The trial was approved by the Swaziland National Health Research Review Board in July 2014 (Reference Number: MH/599C/FWA 000 15267). All participants must be able and willing to give verbal consent for trial participation. The final report will follow the CONSORT reporting guidelines for cluster trials [ 26] and the recommendations for reporting stepped-wedge trials proposed by Hemming et al. [ 27].
